mapper.insert: insert into T_DECORATE_DETAIL (DECORATE_DETAIL_ID, DECORATION_APPLY_ID, DETAIL_ORDER, DETAIL_CONTENT) values (#{decorateDetailId}, #{decorationApplyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{detailOrder,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{detailContent,jdbcType=OTHER})
mapper.select: select DECORATE_DETAIL_ID, DECORATION_APPLY_ID, DETAIL_ORDER, DETAIL_CONTENT from T_DECORATE_DETAIL
